alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Freeze Warning issued January 15 at 2:01AM EST until January 15 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 30. * WHERE...In Florida, Inland St. Johns, Inland Flagler, Coastal Nassau, Coastal Duval, Coastal St. Johns, Coastal Flagler, Trout River and South Central Duval Counties. In Georgia, Coastal Glynn and Coastal Camden Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions could kill crops and other sensitive vegetation.
info.instruction: Appropriate action should be taken to ensure tender vegetation and outdoor pets have adequate protection from the cold temperatures. Young children, the elderly and the homeless are especially vulnerable to the cold. Take measures to protect them.
